192.168.1.0 255.255.255.0
Gép:100
Gép:60
Gép:30
Gép:10

100 dec --> 110 0100 (7bit)
60 dec --> 11 1100 (6bit)
30 dec --> 1 1110	(5bit)
10 dec --> 1010 (4bit)
maszk:
(255.255.255.0)---> 11111111.11111111.11111111.00000000
100:	11111111.11111111.11111111.10000000 -->255.255.255.128 /25
60:		11111111.11111111.11111111.11000000 -->255.255.255.192 /26
30:		11111111.11111111.11111111.11100000 -->255.255.255.224 /27
10:		11111111.11111111.11111111.11110000 --> 255.255.255.240/28

100: 	192.168.1.0 192.168.1.1-126 192.168.1.127
60:		192.168.1.128 192.168.1.129-190 192.168.1.191
30:		192.168.1.192 192.168.1.193-222 192.168.1.223
10:		192.168.1.224 192.168.1.225-238 192.168.1.239


--------------------------------------------------------------
